## Checklist

- [ ] Commit messages follow [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) format
- [ ] JSON files are valid (`python3 -m json.tool < file.json`)
- [ ] SKILL.md has required frontmatter (`name`, `description`, `user_invocable`)
- [ ] `plugin.json` name/version matches `marketplace.json` entry
- [ ] `marketplace.json` updated (if adding a new skill)
- [ ] `README.md` Available Skills table updated (if adding a new skill)
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated under `[Unreleased]`
- [ ] `LICENSE` file included in skill directory (if adding a new skill)
